meanings.sent1: The unmatured fruit was small and green.
meanings.sent2: The cake batter was still unmatured and needed more time in the oven.
meanings.sent3: The unmatured puppy kept tripping over its own paws.
meanings.sent4: Her unmatured skills in painting were like a blank canvas waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The unmatured plant struggled to survive without proper sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The unmatured bananas were too green to eat.
meanings.sent2: The unmatured cheese needed more time to age and develop flavor.
meanings.sent3: He tried to cook with the unmatured tomatoes, but they were too hard.
meanings.sent4: Her unmatured talent in singing needed nurturing to reach its full potential.
meanings.sent5: The unmatured wine tasted sour and lacked depth.

meanings.definition: Not yet grown up or mature.
meanings.sent1: The unmatured child still had a lot to learn about the world.
meanings.sent2: The unmatured behavior of the teenagers caused chaos in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: His unmatured sense of humor often led to awkward situations.
meanings.sent4: The unmatured relationship between the two countries was fragile and unstable.
meanings.sent5: The unmatured decision to quit school had long-term consequences.
